00024   int stages[1];

00052       ot::readNodesFromFile(n2oOut,nodes);
00053       unsigned int dim = nodes[0].getDim();
00054       unsigned int maxDepth = nodes[0].getMaxDepth();
00055     MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);        
00056 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00057   PetscLogStagePush(stages[0]);
00058 #endif

00061   PetscLogStagePop();
00062 #endif
